/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a moment on a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the cityscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the sky. Trees dot the sides of the road, their green leaves adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. In the distance, a tall building stands out, its height dwarfing the surrounding structures. The image is taken from a low angle, looking up at the buildings and power lines, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene.
